short_summary: Maritime High Speed Navigation Systems (MHSNS) for Multi-Mission Rigid Hull Inflatable Boats
description: The Department of National Defence requires Maritime High Speed Navigation Systems (MHSNS) with software and charts integration for Multi-Mission Rigid Hull Inflatable Boats (MMRHIB). The MHSNS must withstand shock and vibration from all sea states and operate under all weather conditions. The SeaCross Marine AB W315 15"NVIS Rugged Panel PC with sensors and accessories is the standard across the fleet and is required for fleet interoperability. Suppliers who consider themselves fully qualified and available to provide the goods, services, or construction services described in the advertisement may submit a statement of capabilities in writing to the contact person identified in this notice on or before the closing date.
full_summary:
### Maritime High Speed Navigation Systems

#### Government Tender Announcement

**Reference Number:** cb-4562-10168131  
**Amendment Number:** 1  
**Solicitation Number:** W6399-23LL85/A  
**Publication Date:** 2023-04-03  
**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-04-18T14:00:00  

#### Notice Type
Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN) issued by the Department of National Defence to provide Maritime High Speed Navigation Systems (MHSNS) to support its fleet of Multi-Mission Rigid Hull Inflatable Boats (RHIBs).

#### Description
The MHSNS must integrate software, firmware, and world marine charts, as well as possess rugged, waterproof, and shock/vibration-resistant capabilities to ensure operation in various weather conditions. The MHSNS must be capable of entering a RHIB console and withstand harsh marine environments.

#### Requirements
To meet the minimum essential requirements, suppliers must be able to provide the following:

- Trackball, joystick, and keypad components
- Radar and communication systems
- Rugged panel PCs and Ethernet switches
- Custom hardening and cable kits

#### Applicability of Trade Agreements
This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), World Trade Organization - Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP), and other relevant trade agreements.

#### Justification for Pre-identified Supplier
SeaCross Marine AB is the only known supplier capable of providing the required components and services, making them the pre-identified supplier for this opportunity.

#### Period of Standing Offer Agreement
The proposed standing offer agreement is for a period of 3 years, with two 1-year option periods.

#### Suppliers' Right to Submit Statement of Capabilities
Suppliers who believe they meet the advertised requirements may submit a statement of capabilities in writing to the contact person identified in this notice on or before the specified closing date.

#### Closing Date
The closing date for accepting statements of capabilities is April 18th, 2023 at 2:00 PM.
